Summary: i saw it with my gf on our way home. ive seen lots of stuff like this but this was her first and she instanly was crying it just dissapeared infront of our eyes
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Aptos

Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsIn aptos cali. With my girlfriend on our way we noticed what seemed to resemble a fire burning in the sky. So I instanly took the time and date and watched as it overed back and forth and stop then zoomed to the right and dimmed out and disapeared before our eyes... I myself have sighting all the time that cannot be explain other than ufo, but my gf had not so me telling her about it all the time and her seing by me was cool cuz she burst up crying and I was like there you go. It was an amazing sighting one of my best to date. I knew instantly it was the real deal.
